text: Yahweh Is King Over All the Earth
Yahweh is king; he clothes himself with majesty.
Yahweh clothes himself; he girds himself with might.
Yes, \add the\add* world is established \add so that\add* it will not be moved.
Your throne \add is\add* established from of old;
\add The\add* rivers have lifted up, O Yahweh;
\add the\add* rivers have lifted up their ⸤rumbling⸥;\f + \fr 93:3 \ft Literally “voice” \f*
\add the\add* rivers have lifted up their pounding.
\add Mightier\add* than the rumblings of many waters,
\add mightier\add* than \add the\add* mighty breakers of \add the\add* sea,
Holiness is fitting for your house,\f + \fr 93:5 \ft Or “temple” \f*
O Yahweh, ⸤forever⸥.\f + \fr 93:5 \ft Literally “for a length of days” \f*
